title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: The frontrunners for the nomination in their two best Senate pickup opportunities John Fetterman in Pennsylvania and Mandela Barnes in Wisconsin hail from the party's liberal wing, and both primary races could turn ugly.
title: 5 plot twists that could upend the midterms
